# allowsToggleToOff

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether clicking or tapping a selected radio button toggles it to an unselected state.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsToggleToOff: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

To implement a group of radio buttons where at least one option must remain in a selected state, set [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotation/allowsToggleToOff] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] on each button in the group.

## Configuring Button Widget Annotations

- **widgetControlType**: The type of button widget control, either radio button, push button, or checkbox.
- **buttonWidgetState**: The current state of the button widget annotation.
- **PDFWidgetCellState**: The state of a button annotation, either on, off, or mixed.
- **buttonWidgetStateString**: A string value that differentiates button widgets in the same group, such as to identify mutually exclusive radio buttons from each other.
- **caption**: The title of push button widget annotations.
- **radiosInUnison**: A Boolean value that indicates whether radio buttons in a group turn on and off in unison.
